function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High mobility of people increasing the probability of approaching infected individuals","Impact":"Higher chances of contagion and transmission of the disease","Mitigation":"Implementing mobility restrictions, social distancing measures, and widespread testing","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, data analytics for mobility tracking, and monitoring systems","People":"General population, travelers, and commuters","Owner":"Government health agencies, transportation authorities, and employers"},{"Description":"Limited medical infrastructure for hospitalization cases","Impact":"Inability to handle the demand for hospital beds and medical care","Mitigation":"Increasing medical infrastructure capacity, establishing field hospitals, and prioritizing critical cases","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote patient monitoring systems, and hospital management software","People":"Patients in need of hospitalization, healthcare workers, and medical facilities","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government health agencies, and medical equipment suppliers"},{"Description":"Economic impact of mobility restrictions on wealth exchange and economic dynamics","Impact":"Disruption of economic activities and seasonal routines leading to financial instability","Mitigation":"Implementing financial support measures, economic stimulus packages, and resource reallocation","Technologies":"Online transaction platforms, digital financial services, and economic forecasting tools","People":"Businesses, workers, and consumers","Owner":"Government financial authorities, business associations, and financial institutions"}]}
